column1: '''''Tolkien Criticism: An Annotated Checklist''''' is a descriptive bibliography of books and articles by and about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], compiled by [[Richard C. West]].

The book includes some quotes from hard-to-find writings by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: (1) Entry A24 on page 5 quotes from the Preface published in ''[[The Ancrene Riwle]]''; (2) Entry B109 on page 34 reprints the brief extract from [[Letter to Richard Lupoff
column2: a letter to Richard Lupoff]] first printed in ''[[Edgar Rice Burroughs: Master of Adventure]]''.

column1: A revised edition of the work was published in 1981 (177 pages, ISBN:978-0873382564).
